scripts.postinstall: pnpm run install:client && pnpm run install:server
scripts.lint: pnpm --prefix ./client run lint && pnpm --prefix ./server run lint
scripts.lint:fix: pnpm --prefix ./client run lint:fix && pnpm --prefix ./server run lint:fix
scripts.format: pnpm --prefix ./client run format && pnpm --prefix ./server run format
scripts.build: concurrently -n server,client -c auto "cd ./server && pnpm run build" "cd ./client && pnpm run build"
scripts.dev: concurrently -n server,client -c auto "cd ./server && pnpm run dev" "cd ./client && pnpm run dev"
scripts.start: concurrently -n server,client -c auto "cd ./server && pnpm run start" "cd ./client && pnpm run dev"
